title: notfairchild
author: notfairchild
content: How do I find a common address between let's say COIN 1, COIN 2 or COIN 3 sellers and buyers? searching through Etherscan or similar explorer site can take hours and hours.Any tool where we can put token contract addresses list and it scans for common address who have held or still actively holding those tokens?Tried googling but no results came out, idk if my search term is correct but I tried every possible search term I could possibly come up with.

comments.author: dbshck
comments.body: I'm not aware of any website/explorer that offers this kind of feature.If you can write SQL you can probably do this with Dune Analytics https://dune.com/. Otherwise, if you're willing to pay for it you can also submit a job bounty to get someone to work on your request.
